com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow

Interface Suspendable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SuspendableWorker, WorkerBase
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActivityWorker, GenericActivityWorker, GenericWorker, GenericWorkflowWorker, SpringActivityWorker, SpringWorkflowWorker, WorkflowWorker

    public interface Suspendable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isPollingSuspended()
      Check suspention status
      void resumePolling()
      Alias to setPollingSuspended(false)
      void setPollingSuspended(boolean flag)
      If set to true stop making any poll requests.
      void suspendPolling()
      Alias to setPollingSuspended(true)

    • Method Detail

      • suspendPolling

        void suspendPolling()
        Alias to setPollingSuspended(true)

      • resumePolling

        void resumePolling()
        Alias to setPollingSuspended(false)

      • isPollingSuspended

        boolean isPollingSuspended()
        Check suspention status

      • setPollingSuspended

        void setPollingSuspended(boolean flag)
        If set to true stop making any poll requests. Outstanding long polls still can return tasks after this method was called. Setting to false enables polling.
